namesection.name: excise
namesection.desc: Delete Soar productions from production memory.

namesection.name: help
namesection.desc: Provide formatted, on-line information about Soar commands.

namesection.name: init-soar
namesection.desc: Reinitialize Soar so a program can be rerun from scratch.

namesection.name: quit
namesection.desc: Close log file, terminate Soar, and return user to the operating system.

namesection.name: run
namesection.desc: Begin Soar's execution cycle.

namesection.name: sp
namesection.desc: The sp command creates a new production and loads it into production memory.

namesection.name: stop-soar
namesection.desc: Interrupt a running Soar program.

namesection.name: default-wme-depth
namesection.desc: Set the level of detail used to print WME's.

namesection.name: gds-print
namesection.desc: Print the WME's in the goal dependency set for each goal.

namesection.name: internal-symbols
namesection.desc: Print information about the Soar symbol table.

namesection.name: matches
namesection.desc: Print information about the match set and partial matches.

namesection.name: memories
namesection.desc: Print memory usage for production matches.

namesection.name: preferences
namesection.desc: Examine items in preference memory.

namesection.name: print
namesection.desc: Print items in working memory or production memory.

namesection.name: production-find
namesection.desc: Find productions that contain a given pattern.

namesection.name: chunk-name-format
namesection.desc: Specify format of the name to use for new chunks.

namesection.name: firing-counts
namesection.desc: Print the number of times productions have fired.

namesection.name: pwatch
namesection.desc: Trace firings and retractions of specific productions.

namesection.name: stats
namesection.desc: Print information on Soar's runtime statistics.

namesection.name: warnings
namesection.desc: Toggle whether or not warnings are printed.

namesection.name: watch
namesection.desc: Control the information printed as Soar runs.

namesection.name: watch-wmes
namesection.desc: Trace WME's matching specific patterns.

namesection.name: attribute-preferences-mode
namesection.desc: In Soar7 mode, controls handling of preferences for non-context slots.

namesection.name: explain-backtraces
namesection.desc: Print information about chunk and justification backtraces.

namesection.name: indifferent-selection
namesection.desc: Controls how indifferent selections are made.

namesection.name: learn
namesection.desc: Set the parameters for chunking, Soar's learning mechanism.

namesection.name: max-chunks
namesection.desc: Limit the number of chunks created during a decision cycle.

namesection.name: max-elaborations
namesection.desc: Limit the maximum number of elaboration cycles.

namesection.name: max-nil-output-cycles
namesection.desc: Limit the maximum number of decision cycles that are executed without producing output when run is invoked with run-til-output args.

namesection.name: multi-attributes
namesection.desc: Declare multi-attributes so as to increase Rete matching efficiency.

namesection.name: numeric-indifferent-mode
namesection.desc: Select method for combining numeric preferences.

namesection.name: o-support-mode
namesection.desc: Choose experimental variations of o-support.

namesection.name: save-backtraces
namesection.desc: Save trace information to explain chunks and justifications.

namesection.name: soar8
namesection.desc: Toggle between Soar 8 methodology and Soar 7 methodology.

namesection.name: timers
namesection.desc: Toggle on or off the internal timers used to profile Soar.

namesection.name: waitsnc
namesection.desc: Generate a wait state rather than a state-no-change impasse.

namesection.name: cd
namesection.desc: Change directory.

namesection.name: dirs
namesection.desc: List the directory stack.

namesection.name: echo
namesection.desc: Print a string to the current output device.

namesection.name: log
namesection.desc: Record all user-interface input and output to a file.

namesection.name: ls
namesection.desc: List the contents of the current working directory.

namesection.name: popd
namesection.desc: Pop the current working directory off the stack and change to the next directory on the stack.

namesection.name: pushd
namesection.desc: Push a directory onto the directory stack, changing to it.

namesection.name: pwd
namesection.desc: Print the current working directory.

namesection.name: rete-net
namesection.desc: Save the current Rete net, or restore a previous one.

namesection.name: set-library-location
namesection.desc: Set the top level directory containing demos/help/etc.

namesection.name: source
namesection.desc: Load and evaluate the contents of a file.

namesection.name: add-wme
namesection.desc: Manually add an element to working memory. Output links.

namesection.name: remove-wme
namesection.desc: Manually remove an element from working memory.

namesection.name: alias
namesection.desc: Define command aliases.

namesection.name: soarnews
namesection.desc: Prints information about the current release.

namesection.name: time
namesection.desc: Uses a default system clock timer to record the wall time required while executing a command.

namesection.name: version
namesection.desc: Returns version number of Soar kernel.

namesection.name: halt
namesection.desc: Terminates Soar's execution and returns to the user prompt.

namesection.name: interrupt
namesection.desc: Causes Soar to stop at the end of the current phase, and return to the user prompt.

namesection.name: write
namesection.desc: Writes its arguments to the standard output.

namesection.name: crlf
namesection.desc: Short for "carriage return, line feed" and can be called only within write.

namesection.name: div
namesection.desc: Returns the integer quotient between two integers.

namesection.name: mod
namesection.desc: Returns the remainder between two integers.

namesection.name: abs
namesection.desc: Returns an integer when its argument is an integer and otherwise returns a real number.

namesection.name: atan2
namesection.desc: Returns a float in radians, the arctangent of (first/arg / second_arg)

namesection.name: sqrt
namesection.desc: Returns a real number, the square root of the given number.

namesection.name: sin
namesection.desc: Returns a real number, the sin value of the given angle in radians.

namesection.name: cos
namesection.desc: Returns a real number, the cos value of the given angle in radians.

namesection.name: int
namesection.desc: Converts a single symbol to an integer constant.

namesection.name: float
namesection.desc: Converts a single symbol to a floating point constant.

namesection.name: timestamp
namesection.desc: Returns a symbol whos print name is a representation of the current date and time.

namesection.name: make-constant-symbol
namesection.desc: Returns a new constant symbol guaranteed to be different from all symbols currently present in the system.

namesection.name: capitalize-symbol
namesection.desc: Returns a new symbol with the first character of the given symbol capitalized.

namesection.name: exec
namesection.desc: Calls user-defined registered functions.

namesection.name: cmd
namesection.desc: Calls built-in Soar commands.

namesection.name: dont-learn
namesection.desc: Turns off learning for the specified state.

namesection.name: force-learn
namesection.desc: Turns on learning for the specified state.
